mapper.select: select ci.user_info_user_info_id_4 , ci.amount , ui.password , ci.coupon_info_id , ui.phone_number , ui.member_level_id , ui.avatar_resource_key , ui.email , ci.is_used , ui.username FROM coupon_info ci left join user_info ui on ci.user_info_user_info_id_4 = ui.user_info_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}

select ci.user_info_user_info_id_4 , ci.amount , ui.password , ci.coupon_info_id , ui.phone_number , ui.member_level_id , ui.avatar_resource_key , ui.email , ci.is_used , ui.username FROM coupon_info ci left join user_info ui on ci.user_info_user_info_id_4 = ui.user_info_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}

select ci.user_info_user_info_id_4 , ci.amount , ui.password , ci.coupon_info_id , ui.phone_number , ui.member_level_id , ui.avatar_resource_key , ui.email , ci.is_used , ui.username FROM coupon_info ci left join user_info ui on ci.user_info_user_info_id_4 = ui.user_info_id where ci.coupon_info_id = #{id}
